Detailed Description

Interface class for all device profile persistor implementations.

Member Function Documentation

◆ GetVersion()

String IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistor::GetVersion ( )

Gets the profile persistor version to be used. The default empty value means the default persistor version will be used.

Returns
A string value of the version or empty for default

Loads all profiles.

Parameters

◆ SetVersion()

int IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistor::SetVersion ( String^  sVersion)

Sets the profile persistor version to be used. An empty value means a default version will be chosen automatically.

Parameters
sVersionThe new version to use.
Returns
ISAGENT_OK
